name: pnp-remove-personal-app
title: Removes Microsoft Teams personal app from users and Microsoft Teams app catalog
shortDescription: Uninstalls an app from the specified users and / or unpublish it from the Microsoft Teams app catalog based on the App Id.
longDescription: Uninstalls an app from the specified users and / or unpublish it from the Microsoft Teams app catalog based on the App Id available in the `manifest.json` of the Teams app.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
